Name: Hikikomori No Chuunibyou
About the game: Hikikomori No Chuunibyou is a pseudo 8-bit platform-adventure game with beat-em-up, puzzle, and stealth elements. With its storytelling directing the player through open-ended levels, progression through each stage requires usage of parkour-like abilities and martial-arts techniques. Features: Parkour-inspired platforming Open-ended levels with story-focused progression Beat-em-up, puzzle, and stealth elements Unlimited continues and frequent checkpoints 8-bit graphics and soundtrack Supports Xbox 360 Controller (recommended)
